languages.text: "Ты видела все своими глазами, или то были видения, посланные культу?" {n}В мягком голосе мужчины сквозит сомнение.{/n} "При всем уважении, обвинения, основанные на видениях... сложно опровергнуть. Вы не страшитесь пролить кровь на основании темных гаданий. Но не все здесь такие".

traits.locale_text: "Ты видела все своими глазами, или то были видения, посланные культу?" {n}В мягком голосе мужчины сквозит сомнение.{/n} "При всем уважении, обвинения, основанные на видениях... сложно опровергнуть. Вы не страшитесь пролить кровь на основании темных гаданий. Но не все здесь такие".

languages.text: "Do you have proof of these charges, or are such claims the result of cultic revelations?" {n}There is doubt in the man's gentle voice.{/n} "With all due respect, it is difficult to discern the truth of these accusations without evidence. Divine visions and dark portents may be reason enough for you to shed blood, but not everyone here shares your perspective."

Вы не страшитесь пролить кровь на основании темных гаданий. Но не все здесь такие".

Divine visions and dark portents may be reason enough for you to shed blood, but not everyone here shares your perspective."

languages.text: «¿Tiene pruebas de estas acusaciones o son solo fruto de las revelaciones del culto?». {n}Existe una duda en la voz amable del hombre.{/n} «Con el debido respeto, es difícil saber la verdad sin pruebas. Las visiones divinas y los presagios oscuros pueden ser motivo suficiente para derramar sangre para ustedes, pero aquí no todos compartimos esa idea».
languages.original_text: "Do you have proof of these charges, or are such claims the result of cultic revelations?" {n}There is doubt in the man's gentle voice.{/n} "With all due respect, it is difficult to discern the truth of these accusations without evidence. Divine visions and dark portents may be reason enough for you to shed blood, but not everyone here shares your perspective."

languages.text: 「それらの告発の証拠はあるのですか？それともそのような主張はカルトの啓示の結果ですか？」{n}男の穏やかな声には迷いがあった。 {/n}「失礼ながら、証拠なしにこれらの告発の真偽を見極めるのは困難です。神聖なビジョンや暗い予兆は、あなたには血を流すのに十分な理由かもしれませんが、ここにいる全員があなたの考え方に共感しているわけではありません」
languages.original_text: "Do you have proof of these charges, or are such claims the result of cultic revelations?" {n}There is doubt in the man's gentle voice.{/n} "With all due respect, it is difficult to discern the truth of these accusations without evidence. Divine visions and dark portents may be reason enough for you to shed blood, but not everyone here shares your perspective."

languages.text: “这些指控有证据吗？还是说，这些说词不过是所谓启示的结果？”{n}男人温和的声音中带着怀疑的意味。{/n}“恕我直言，如果没有证据，旁人很难辨别你的指控是真是假。或许对你而言，神圣的景象与黑暗的预兆就已经足够了，但这里并不是每个人都同意你的观点。”
languages.original_text: "Do you have proof of these charges, or are such claims the result of cultic revelations?" {n}There is doubt in the man's gentle voice.{/n} "With all due respect, it is difficult to discern the truth of these accusations without evidence. Divine visions and dark portents may be reason enough for you to shed blood, but not everyone here shares your perspective."

languages.text: "Habt Ihr Beweise für diese Anschuldigungen oder sind sie das Ergebnis von kultischen Enthüllungen?" {n}Es liegt Zweifel in der sanften Stimme des Mannes.{/n} "Bei allem Respekt, ohne Beweise ist es schwierig, den Wahrheitsgehalt dieser Vorwürfe zu bewerten. Göttliche Visionen und dunkle Omen mögen Euch als Grund ausreichen, Blut zu vergießen, doch nicht jeder hier teilt Eure Ansicht."
languages.original_text: "Do you have proof of these charges, or are such claims the result of cultic revelations?" {n}There is doubt in the man's gentle voice.{/n} "With all due respect, it is difficult to discern the truth of these accusations without evidence. Divine visions and dark portents may be reason enough for you to shed blood, but not everyone here shares your perspective."

languages.text: « Avez-vous des preuves de ces accusations, ou ces affirmations sont-elles le produit de révélations cultuelles ? » {n}demande l'homme avec une pointe de doute dans la voix.{/n} « Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, sans preuve, il me paraît difficile de discerner la vérité. Les visions divines et sombres présages sont peut-être pour vous une raison suffisante de verser le sang, mais tout le monde ici ne partage pas votre point de vue. »
languages.original_text: "Do you have proof of these charges, or are such claims the result of cultic revelations?" {n}There is doubt in the man's gentle voice.{/n} "With all due respect, it is difficult to discern the truth of these accusations without evidence. Divine visions and dark portents may be reason enough for you to shed blood, but not everyone here shares your perspective."

languages.text: "Bu suçlamalara yönelik kanıtınız var mı yoksa bu iddialar, tarikat vahiylerinin bir sonucu mu?" {n}Adamın nazik sesinde kuşkulu bir tonlama var.{/n} "Affınıza sığınıyorum ama kanıt olmada bu tür suçlamaların barındırdığı hakikati ayırt etmek zordur. Kâhinlerin görüleri ile karanlık alametler, sizin gözünüzde kan dökmek için yeterli bir sebep olsa da buradaki herkes sizinle aynı görüşte değil."
languages.original_text: "Do you have proof of these charges, or are such claims the result of cultic revelations?" {n}There is doubt in the man's gentle voice.{/n} "With all due respect, it is difficult to discern the truth of these accusations without evidence. Divine visions and dark portents may be reason enough for you to shed blood, but not everyone here shares your perspective."
